sql.if: where ${search} in ( select writer from member2 where writer like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' )

where title like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' or content like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
or writer in ( select writer from member2 where writer like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' )

mapper.select: select n.*, (select writer from member2 where userid = writer) writer from (select rownum no, n.* from (select * from notice order by id asc) n order by no desc) n where no between #{beginList} and #{endList}
mapper.insert: insert into notice ( userid, title, content, writer) values ( #{userid}, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer})
mapper.select: select n.*, (select writer from member2 where userid=writer) writer from notice n where id=#{id}
mapper.update: update notice set readcnt = readcnt+1 where id=#{id}
update notice set title=#{title}, content=#{content} where id=#{id}
